0.title: BF2C-1 Goshawk: new reserve aircraft of the USA
0.description: New reserve aircraft comes to the US tech tree in the upcoming War Thunder update. Meet first photos and details!

1.title: BM-31-12: Katyusha’s Little Brother
1.description: Soviet multiple-rocket launch system BM-31-12 will become the main prize of the upcoming Victory Day event in War Thunder.

2.title: Pre-order: M1 KVT
2.description: A visually modified M1 Abrams MBT to represent a Soviet tank in exercises, with premium status and pre-order bonuses!

0.title: Victory Day in War Thunder
0.description: Victory! Many allied countries spent years with trials and tribulations to end the bloodiest war in the history of humanity, and in early May of 1945 their efforts finally bore fruit. This victory is the most important event of the XXth century that is remembered and celebrated today by tens of millions of people. Join us in War Thunder to commemorate this event!

1.title: Legend of Victory: BM-31-12 “Andryusha”
1.description: Meet the bane of the Wehrmacht — MLRS BM-31-12 “Andryusha”! This vehicle undertook its baptism by fire under Novgorod in Russia and helped push the front way back to Berlin — truly a Legend of Victory! You can receive it and many other prizes, including keys from the “Demolition crate” that contains items from past War Thunder events!

2.title: Pages of History (May)
2.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon.

0.title: War Thunder "Sky Guardians" - Changelog
0.description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization  along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin!. In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!
